title: Joeyp
author: Joeyp
content: Nowadays if you transfer Tether USDT on TRON network, it will cost you around 30 TRON ( 2.35$ ). It is not cheap, if you, for example, transfer less than 10.00 USDT. So just TRON transfers are more cheaper - free for up to 5 transfers per day.

comments.author: kizlod
comments.body: Yeah, I've noticed that. Why is it that way exactly? Too bad, I need to use exactly USDT.

comments.author: terciduk123
comments.body: Quote from: Joeyp on June 06, 2023, 08:48:00 PMNowadays if you transfer Tether USDT on TRON network, it will cost you around 30 TRON ( 2.35$ ). It is not cheap, if you, for example, transfer less than 10.00 USDT. So just TRON transfers are more cheaper - free for up to 5 transfers per day.How is it possible? I rarely make transactions using the Tron network. However, if we do the USDT "Tether" withdrawal of the Tron network in the Binance Exchange, it costs only 1 USDT.

comments.author: libert19
comments.body: Quote from: terciduk123 on June 07, 2023, 03:42:49 AMQuote from: Joeyp on June 06, 2023, 08:48:00 PMNowadays if you transfer Tether USDT on TRON network, it will cost you around 30 TRON ( 2.35$ ). It is not cheap, if you, for example, transfer less than 10.00 USDT. So just TRON transfers are more cheaper - free for up to 5 transfers per day.How is it possible? I rarely make transactions using the Tron network. However, if we do the USDT "Tether" withdrawal of the Tron network in the Binance Exchange, it costs only 1 USDT.Binance must have lots of staked TRX to get free resources, so transfers are technically free for binance and even this 1 usdt will go into binance's pockets while if you directly transfer usdt and pay fee via TRX it will cost as op pointed out.

comments.author: Xal0lex
comments.created_time: June 07, 2023, 02:32:08 PMLast edit: June 07, 2023, 05:12:33 PM by Xal0lex
comments.body: The commissions in the Tron network have become very high in the last 8 months. To reduce commissions or even remove them altogether, you need to buy a number of tron and put them in the staking. For this you will get energy and bandwidth. And if you have enough energy and bandwidth, then transaction fees can be removed altogether.

comments.author: mdzahed134
comments.body: Quote from: Joeyp on June 06, 2023, 08:48:00 PMNowadays if you transfer Tether USDT on TRON network, it will cost you around 30 TRON ( 2.35$ ). It is not cheap, if you, for example, transfer less than 10.00 USDT. So just TRON transfers are more cheaper - free for up to 5 transfers per day.Yeah, small investors will affect to increase such fees. It’s increased in the recent time? I didn’t noticed it. I'm using Binance exchange to transfer my Tether USDT in tron network here only 1$ USDT need to transfer it’s seems very low transaction fee i think.
